availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy A. Barker Bailey in Grant County, Kentucky, on September 4, 1851. Father of Mary E. Bailey, Louisa A. Bailey, Hulda J. Bailey, James H. Bailey, and Georgeann Bailey. Farmer in Grant County in 1860. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 921.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, District 1, p. 391A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Grant County Marriages, 1820-1865, Film #001490815, p. 77.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Pendleton County, KY, June and July 1863, p. 57, 106 of 495 of microfilm.
